parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Multiplayer </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Team Switch </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> Object Detection </value></part><part><name>GROUP3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a list of playable units available for switching to.
Command is relative to the client on which it is executed and will only show playable units for the same [[side]] as [[player]]'s [[group]] + [[player]] himself,
unless in singleplayer where playable units from all sides will be accessible via this command.<br>
Dead and player-controlled units are automatically removed from the resulting array.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> In Multiplayer, [[switchableUnits]] are only available when [[description.ext#respawn|respawn]] type is set to SIDE or GROUP, the mission contains units marked playable and [[player]] is able to switch to any of those units. </value></part></template><br>
In order to get all ''playable'' units regardless of their [[side]], see the [[playableUnits]] command. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[switchableUnits]] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> _availableUnits = [[switchableUnits]]; </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  [[allPlayers]], [[units]], [[allCurators]], [[allGroups]], [[allDead]], [[playableUnits]], [[vehicles]], [[allUnitsUAV]], [[allDeadMen]], [[teamSwitch]], [[Team_Switch]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 
</value></part></template>
